author: Nick Nairn
method: Place the soy sauce, sesame oil, sesame seeds, honey and chilli flakes into a large bowl and whisk together. Add the noodles, onion, rocket and orange segments and toss together and season, to taste, with salt and freshly ground black pepper. To serve, place the noodle salad into the centre of a dish.
ingredients: 1 tsp soy sauce,  1 tsp sesame oil,  1 tsp sesame seeds,  1 tsp honey,  ½ tsp dried chilli flakes,  100g/3½oz rice noodles, cooked according to packet instructions,  ½ red onion, finely chopped,  50g/1¾oz rocket,  1 orange, peeled and segmented,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
